name: Rat Rampage (silversalem101)
description:
Try playing in full screen

For years the snakes have preyed upon the rat village striking fear into the hearts of every inhabitant. One rat in particular has had enough and decided to take a stand for all rat kind.

Shedding one of his many disguises, he alone will defend the rat village against the intruders and battle his way through the underground metaverse to ultimately defeat the snake king.

Join our hero on his RAT RAMPAGE!
